solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public List<Integer> rightSideView(TreeNode root) {--newline--        List<Integer> result = new ArrayList<Integer>();--newline--        rightView(root, result, 0);--newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    public void rightView(TreeNode curr, List<Integer> result, int currDepth){--newline--        if(curr == null){--newline--            return;--newline--        }--newline--        if(currDepth == result.size()){--newline--            result.add(curr.val);--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        rightView(curr.right, result, currDepth + 1);--newline--        rightView(curr.left, result, currDepth + 1);--newline--        --newline--    }--newline--}
